column1:
Could have been better

Location was good.
Booking was made online but rang and spoke with mangers twice about the girls being 17 with no one over 18 staying with them. A couple of days before they were due to arrive an email was received to ...

Beautiful place to stay in...

The apartment was very nice and comfortable. The heated swimming pool was fantastic!!! The staff was very friendly and always wiling to solve any problem that we had.
The access to the wifi service was not easy to use. Apparently, it was prepared to be used through a computer more than from the phone or on the TV.

Overall good. Will defo come...

Movie room and pool. The room in the new building is clean.
There was a bit of confusion when we were about to check-in. The staff told us that they're only giving us 1 room and if we want another one, we need to pay for it. I showed her the booking ...

It was excellent overall and...

The pool and the gym were fantastic. The location was so convenient and close to the city. The little village was just so cute and clean aswell especially for affordable accommodation!
Reception was a bit confusing. We arrived for check in around 8pm and had to call after hours to have someone come out to meet us, and when we left, there was no one in reception yet and no one ...

Very convenient

Great location. Ease of checking in and out. Good value
There was no dish washing liquid or cloths to clean dishes
